HBProfile.Name: [QO] [H] Tricks and Treats of Kalimdor (incl. Cataclysm)

CustomBehavior.Text: You must be Level 60 or higher with Flight Master's License to use this profile.\nGo to Kalimdor then press Continue Profile.
Moving to Orgrimmar, Valley of Strength

CustomBehavior.Lua: local id,n=0; for b=0,4 do for s=1,GetContainerNumSlots(b) do id=GetContainerItemID(b,s) if (id == 37586) then ClearCursor() PickupContainerItem(b,s) DeleteCursorItem() end end end
for i=1,40 do name,_ = UnitAura("player", i) if (name == nil) then break end if (strfind(name, "Costume")) then CancelUnitBuff("player", i) end end
local id,n=0; for b=0,4 do for s=1,GetContainerNumSlots(b) do id=GetContainerItemID(b,s) if (id == 37586) then ClearCursor() PickupContainerItem(b,s) DeleteCursorItem() end end end

for i=1,40 do name,_ = UnitAura("player", i) if (name == nil) then break end if (strfind(name, "Costume")) then CancelUnitBuff("player", i) end end

for i=1,40 do name,_ = UnitAura("player", i) if (name == nil) then break end if (strfind(name, "Costume")) then CancelUnitBuff("player", i) end end
